title: Evan Pavlica, Software Engineer
bio: Los Angeles-based Software Engineer Evan Pavlica has over 5 years of experience creating web experiences.  Specializing in Ruby and Javascript, he has worked on projects ranging from e-commerce sites to specialty product launch pages.  Evan has a passion for clean, self-documenting code, and for embracing the latest web standards and technologies.  In his personal time, he is proud to sing with the Gay Men's Chorus of Los Angeles.
